definitions.text: a river in southwestern Alabama; flows into Mobile Bay
a port in southwestern Alabama on Mobile Bay
sculpture suspended in midair whose delicately balanced parts can be set in motion by air currents

examples: the nomadic habits of the Bedouins
believed the profession of a peregrine typist would have a happy future

definitions.text: moving or capable of moving readily (especially from place to place)
examples: the tongue is...the most mobile articulator

definitions.text: capable of changing quickly from one state or condition to another

examples: Britain is not a truly fluid society
